README.md

Learning Goals

  • Learn how to use static site generators to scaffold projects
    • Eleventy / 11ty
  • Learn how to use templating languages to reduce the DOM complexity
  • Introduce DOM

Prerequisites

Windows

WSL - Windows Subsystem for Linux

I personally recommend installing WSL on any windows machine as many programming tutorials will be easier to follow if you follow the Linux options. The default distribution this ships with is Ubuntu / Debian.

  1. Open a powershell / command prompt terminal in administrator mode
  2. wsl --install
  3. restart machine
  4. open a terminal and create a user account and password (keep this one simple and use a password manager)
  • you don't need to make it a secure password because the only people that can access your machine have to get through your computer password first
  • on a full Linux install you'd normally have to

macOS
